Material used.Description: The experiment used HEK293 cells stably expressing LRRK2 variants.

Readout description.Result Description: G2019S exhibited 2-fold increased kinase activity compared to wild-type.
R1441C showed 50% reduced kinase activity compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2-expressing cells served as positive controls.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector-transfected cells served as negative controls.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA with post-hoc Tukey's test was used.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Kinase activity within 80-120% of wild-type levels

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Kinase activity <50% or >150% of wild-type levels

Material used.Description: Cell viability was assessed in HEK293 cells expressing LRRK2 variants.

Readout description.Result Description: G2019S showed 30% reduced viability compared to wild-type.
R1441C exhibited 15% reduced viability compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2-expressing cells served as positive controls.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector-transfected cells served as negative controls.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA with post-hoc Tukey's test was used.
